creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: two collaged figures with wolf heads on female human bodies; figure on L has snake skin patterned legs and hands on the other figure's waist; the figure on R has a yellow, brown, and pink watercolored body with white splatter pattern and PL hand on hip; above figures are draped black and red ribbon-like streamers

title: Intertwined
